ComicInfo.Summary:
The ship is torn by a battle of head vs. heart. Now that they have the allmighty power of The Midas Touch at their hands, do they have what it takes to use it on the Federation's home planet? Lives are at stake and friendships are challenged in issue #5 of THE MIDAS FLESH!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | John Keogh | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Emily Carroll | 2 |
